Description: Book of the Dead of Ani; frame 17; full colour vignettes; yellow double-borders. Spell 93; spell 43; spell 89; spell 91; spell 92.
Curator's comments: Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 100.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (24)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134357) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134357)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2012 July - September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Red ink Pigment (loss) Backed: brown paper Displayed in new Funerary Galleries (Rm 63) from May to October 1999; removed due to concern over fading of orange and yellow pigment. Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
